content: My PR #24127 is not on the review queue but it says it is on the page "Why is my PR not on the queue?". Is it possible it has something to do with the fact that I added the awaiting author label back after realizing I made a minor mistake and then removed it myself?
This topic was moved here from #PR reviews > #24127 PR not on the review queue. by David Ledvinka.

Also the "Why is my PR not on the queue?" page says my new PR #24241 is coming from a fork, even though from my perspective I used exactly the same process to start this as my previous PRs. I am worried I did something weird that is messing them both up?
This second issue seems to have fixed itself (with #24241) but not #24127
I see both PRs as shown in the queue now.
(I can look into the "why" of previous states later, possibly tomorrow.)
